title: Michael Palin
summary: Sir Michael Edward Palin KCMG CBE FRGS FRSGS (/ˈpeɪlɪn/; born 5 May 1943[1]) is an English actor, comedian, writer, television presenter and public speaker. He was a member of the comedy group Monty Python.[2] Since 1980 he has made a number of travel documentaries.[3]
